name: lit (itch) (Yadu Rajiv)
description:
How to Play

  • Use mouse to move mirrors & reflect light
  • Shift + Click to rotate mirrors
  • Reflect light from the source(orange) to the end points(usually white) to win.
  • Click and drag to pan the camera in larger rooms.

If you cannot see anything above, you will need to enable flash for your browser. Do leave a comment below if you would like to see more of the game :)
